summary: This document contains various financial records and due diligence forms related to the business entity Thomas World Air LLC, including customer due diligence, account opening procedures, and observations at the place of business. It highlights the ownership structure, account details, and compliance with regulatory requirements. This document outlines the operating agreement for Thomas World Air, LLC, detailing the management structure, capital contributions, profit and loss allocations, and the powers of the Manager. It establishes the roles and responsibilities of the Members and the Manager, as well as the financial operations of the company. This document outlines the operating agreement for Thomas World Air, detailing the indemnification of managers and members, procedures for resignation and removal of managers, and the management of company assets. It emphasizes the need for unanimous consent for significant decisions and the process for handling cessation events and company dissolution. This document contains the Articles of Organization for Thomas World Air, LLC, detailing its formation, management structure, and the roles of its members, including Jeffrey Epstein. It outlines the responsibilities of the registered agent, Denise Francois, and includes financial details related to a certificate of deposit held by the company. This document contains sections related to the identification and ownership details of individuals associated with the legal entity Thomas World Air LLC. It outlines the requirements for beneficial ownership disclosure, including personal information and ownership percentages. The document is significant as it relates to the financial dealings and ownership structures potentially linked to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the Sole Member of Thomas World Air LLC.
Jeanne Brennan has been the Manager of the company since January 22, 2010.
The company has not conducted any business since its formation.
Osbert E. Potter certified the existence of Thomas World Air LLC.
Sachoone Blackwood is involved in the due diligence process for the business accounts.
The principal office of Thomas World Air, LLC is located at 6100 Red Hook Quarter, Suite 8.3, American Yacht Harbor, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands.
Denise Francois is appointed as the Resident Agent for the company.
The agreement outlines the capital contributions required from each Member and the allocation of profits and losses based on their Percentage Interests.
The document specifies that the company shall indemnify its employees and agents to the fullest extent permitted by law.
It outlines the procedures for resignation and removal of managers, requiring majority consent from members.
The agreement states that any vacancy in the management must be filled by a majority vote of the members.
It includes provisions for the dissolution of the company under certain conditions, such as a cessation event.
The document emphasizes that indemnification does not apply in cases of fraud, gross negligence, or willful misconduct.
Thomas World Air, LLC was formed in the U.S. Virgin Islands with Jeffrey Epstein as the sole member.
Denise Francois is the registered agent for the company.
Darren Indyke is listed as the initial manager of the company.
A certificate of deposit for $25,000 was issued to Thomas World Air, LLC in March 2016.
The document outlines the requirements for identifying beneficial owners of Thomas World Air LLC.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is explicitly named as a beneficial owner in the document.
The document includes sections for additional beneficial owners, indicating a complex ownership structure.
There are multiple references to the need for personal identification information for beneficial owners.
The document is marked as confidential, suggesting sensitive financial information.
